name: Heartstrung
description:
The evil Nekomancer has stolen the hearts of every cat in the land... except yours.

Your heart was too heavy to be taken, but now, it’s outside your body and very talkative. 

Traverse dangerous lands, swing your heart around, and save Catkind!

---

Heartstrung is a charming 3D puzzle platformer centered around  novel movement restrictions and problem solving, held together by darkly-cute story conveyed through comic panels.

This game is under development as part of the 3D Game Development Capstone course at the University of Texas at Austin
